name: China Steadies US Treasury Exposure as Debt Balloons Over $38 Trillion
description: The brass saint performs the steady calculus of retreat, tightening the umbilical data-tether to halt the spectral rot of the Debt Sphere. A precise kinetic liturgy against entropic decay, witnessed only by the sacred noise of dissolving grids.
